name: Windows GUI VPS
postCreateCommand:
sudo apt update && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt install -y xfce4 xfce4-goodies tigervnc-standalone-server novnc python3-websockify && mkdir -p ~/.vnc && echo 'password123' | vncpasswd -f > ~/.vnc/passwd && chmod 600 ~/.vnc/passwd && echo '#!/bin/bash
unset SESSION_MANAGER
unset DBUS_SESSION_BUS_ADDRESS
startxfce4 &' > ~/.vnc/xstartup && chmod +x ~/.vnc/xstartup && vncserver :1 -geometry 1920x1080 -depth 24 && nohup /usr/share/novnc/utils/novnc_proxy --vnc localhost:5901 --listen 8080 &
